title: SkypeCap 1.0 + Serial Number
description:
SkypeCap for Mac captures and records audio calls made from Skype. Recorded calls are saved as MP4 files, to be replayed, shared, archived, or studied. SkypeCap is valuable for business, a practical tool for everyday and very easy to use. 

WouldnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t you love to stop time and take a minute to catch up? ItÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s nearly impossible to take notes during a call session and keep up with the conversation. Stay in the conversation and keep the discussion moving when the Skype call is recorded with SkypeCap.

Do you wish you could be in two places at once? With Skypecap call recorder software you can make that 3pm sales call in person and not miss a word of the 3pm conference call. When the Skype conference call is recorded and saved with SkypeCap, you simply listen to the recorded call later, when itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s convenient for you.

Skype calls recorded with SkypeCap can be referenced again and again. Calls are saved in an MP4 format: compact and versatile. Use the saved calls to hone your phone presentation skills. A saved conference call can be distributed to anyone who missed the original call. Sales calls and interviews can be saved and more carefully reviewed later.

SkypeCap records your audio Skype calls for you. ItÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s so easy now to record your call, listen to it later, and save it forever. Download SkypeCap today.

SkypeCap is a valuable business tool.
Record important conference calls.
Distribute saved calls to your organization.
Use the recorded call as the meeting call report.


SkypeCap for Mac is great for personal use.
Record audio Skype calls from far away loved ones.
Share recorded calls with family and friends.
Playback important calls to get all the details.


SkypeCapÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s control panel is straightforward and easy to use.
Record audio calls automatically or start and stop recording where you like.
Change the Sample Rate to improve the audio quality or decrease the file size.
Specify an output folder location to keep your recorded calls organized.


SkypeCap Features:
Auto Record Option
Start and stop recording any time

Adjustable Sample Rate control
Output Folder location control
Compact file format ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ MP4

And because Skype can also be used for telephone and cellular calls, SkypeCap can also record these calls. Any kind of audio call made with Skype can be recorded with SkypeCap:
Conference calls
Cellular calls
Telephone calls
Skype to Skype calls
Use SkypeCap to record your call now. Listen to the file created by SkypeCap later. Save important calls forever.
